UNITURN mérőállomás doboz hátlap)
(szerszám beállítás)
t1 m d1 h19
t2 m d2 h19
t3 m d3 h19
yxz
safe100,10
movz=20
maxz=40

xm

t1
s50
f200

(átmenő)
h = 5
(süllyesztés mélység)
h2 = 2.5
y0 = 19.5
o0 = 12.9
hc = 31
hc2 = div($hc,2)
xc = 26
xc2 = div($xc,2)

d0 = 2.5
d1 = 24
fx = 24
fy = 19
fx2 = div($fx,2)
fy2 = div($fy,2)
gx = 0.1
c = 0.3

(hdmi)
x = add($o0,$hc2)
f1x = sub($x,$fx2)
f1y = sub($y0,$fy2)
f2x = add($x,$fx2)
f2y = add($y0,$fy2)

h $x,$y0 d$d1 z$h c$c s70 f300 g2,.5,2
h $f1x,$f1y z$h d$d0
h $f2x,$f2y z$h d$d0

(rj45)
x = sum($x,$hc2,$xc2,$gx)
f1x = sub($x,$fy2)
f1y = add($y0,$fx2)
f2x = add($x,$fy2)
f2y = sub($y0,$fx2)

h $x,$y0 d$d1 z$h c$c s70 f300 g2,.5,2
h $f1x,$f1y z$h d$d0
h $f2x,$f2y z$h d$d0

(usb)
x = sum($x,$hc2,$xc2,$gx)
f1x = sub($x,$fx2)
f1y = sub($y0,$fy2)
f2x = add($x,$fx2)
f2y = add($y0,$fy2)

h $x,$y0 d$d1 z$h c$c s70 f300 g2,.5,2
h $f1x,$f1y z$h d$d0
h $f2x,$f2y z$h d$d0

(canon d25)
x = sum($x,$hc2,$gx)
cx1 = 3
cx2 = sub(53,$cx1)
cd0 = 2.5
cd1 = 5.5

f1x = add($x,$cx1)
f2x = add($x,$cx2)

(furat1)
h $f1x,$y0 z$h d$cd0
(süllyesztés1)
h $f1x,$y0 z$h2 d$cd1 ng

(furat2)
h $f2x,$y0 z$h d$cd0
(süllyesztés2)
h $f2x,$y0 z$h2 d$cd1 ng

cx3 = 6.5
ch = 9.5
ch2 = div($ch,2)
y2 = sub($y0,$ch2)
x2 = add($x,$cx3)

b inline $x2,$y2 size40.5,$ch z$h c$c g1,0.3,2

(tápcsati)
#h 150,18.1 z5 d11.9 c0.1 s70 f300 g2,.5,2
